channel.title: Need help witta cuple o things plz
channel.description:
1. i wanted to do the tut on admin glow i did it but i only glow when i have full guthans on and the glow is halfway up my body
2. i did the tut 2 make a npc say if the owner is online i did it but i dunno what i gotta do???do i gotta spawn the npc by saying ::npc 3432 and if i do spawn the npc it dunt say anything kan anyone help???
ALL FOR TESTSCAPE [br][size=1]Posted at: September 09, 2006, 06:08:17 PM[/size][hr]BUMP[br][size=1]Posted at: September 09, 2006, 06:11:42 PM[/size][hr]BUMP[br][size=1]Posted at: September 10, 2006, 05:04:03 AM[/size][hr]BUMP

  1. i did the tut 2 make a npc say if the owner is online i did it but i dunno what i gotta do???do i gotta spawn the npc by saying ::npc 3432 and if i do spawn the npc it dunt say anything kan anyone help???

  1. Sorry I cannot help with that.
  2. How did you do that? Did you put in that “admin” spot or something with your name on the server? Try that.
